body:
I wouldn't make this a ::call metohd on ForkValue becuase it makes it seem like it is an overload of the normal call function. We can just make this a method of to_ir.

You can call `input.value(*m.graph())` there is no need to check that input size is 1 at this point.
body_html:

You can call input.value(*m.graph()) there is no need to check that input size is 1 at this point.
body_text:
I wouldn't make this a ::call metohd on ForkValue becuase it makes it seem like it is an overload of the normal call function. We can just make this a method of to_ir.
You can call input.value(*m.graph()) there is no need to check that input size is 1 at this point.
